location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 19 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Factors at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: A short letter that reports a deposit of 15,000 piastres has been received (from Coja Evra) and asks what to do with the money. The letter states that a source in Muscat has reported that Pondicherry had been taken from the French and that the company has strong forces in Bengal and Madras. Other administrative issues are also mentioned. Shipped by Hamdan Caracky.
